Welcome, Benny! 🙏 This will be our 5th full-time hire focused on community efforts. Why? Community is at the very core of everything we do. Empowering and enabling our community to connect/build/grow/and help us define the future is something we take very seriously. 🙏

@cowripkenjr @popo @dgnix22 @basqbirds @moonbirds @oddities_xyz @proof_xyz our take (and yes, we're still learning): as long as it's a derivative work (e.g., real art, not just copy/paste) that doesn't claim to be an official Moonbirds project or cause confusion, then game on, let the art live and flourish.
New upgrades to the nesting 🪹 website + new stats section: https://t.co/diwgpZlhKE

@falling_ideas @Vince_Van_Dough @opensea Happy to. If someone is claiming to be us, or confusing the market by acting like us (e.g. "Moonbirds XYZ release" which we didn't release) we ask them to change their name or take it down.
These are the market conditions that discourage money-motivated projects. There is no ETH price at which web3 becomes less interesting. Back to work. 🛠

@Vince_Van_Dough @opensea Also, I was more disappointed in 'all or nothing' approach to trademark law. Why are you against coming on the podcast? I'm legitimately just asking to walk through your thinking. Given you're not involved in any other projects that I know of, why not come on/out?

@Vince_Van_Dough @opensea I'm sorry but this is incorrect. I never asked OpenSea to block the name Moonbirds. They did so because dozens of fake projects were appearing in real-time, and this helped them block the scams before they happened. They also do this with many other projects you're invested in.

@Vince_Van_Dough @opensea That said, you have some valid points, but you’re cherry picking. I’d ask that you have some courage and come out and talk to me on a podcast about this, no addenda, just a conversation about trade offs if you’re willing to step out from the shadows.
@Vince_Van_Dough @opensea No one is confusing a Tom Sacks Chanel guillotine with a real Chanel project…

@Vince_Van_Dough @opensea I welcome all artist interpretations of Moonbirds, yours included. What we aim to protect is confusion. You own Tyler Hobbs Fidenzas. If I started a new collection called “Tyler Hobbs Fidenza” that would be wrong. We’re just asking for the same treatment.
This is as good as it gets 🥰 https://t.co/AyIyC8ItJR

@airlair @Vince_Van_Dough @opensea @airlair is correct, the only thing we care about is market confusion. that almost always happens when you get our name combined with almost identical artwork and a big 10k collection.
@moonbirdsbot amazing pickup!
@beeple @JoshBobrowsky @garyvee @ajv I'll match whatever @beeple does, if he's in for another 20, so am I.

In web3 time it may seem like there are lulls in product development, but rest assured we have over 15+ people (and growing) working full-time on future PROOF/Moonbirds projects...so much fun coming over the next year.

Hiring update: Including Justin, we now have 3 full-time (absolutely phenomenal) product designers/illustrators working at PROOF - with a fourth starting soon. Wait till you see what we're cooking 👩‍🍳 up...
